title: Argentina
brief_description: Buenos Aires is the commercial, industrial, and financial centre of Argentina; the inland pampas region is the source of Argentina’s wealth. The interdependence of the city and the agricultural area is emphasised.
description: Buenos Aires is the commercial, industrial, and financial centre of Argentina; the inland pampas region is the source of Argentina’s wealth. The interdependence of the city and the agricultural area is emphasised.
